channel.title: productivity on Wil's blog
channel.description: Recent content in productivity on Wil's blog

item.title: Shortcuts on mac terminal
item.description: Open Visual Studio open ~/.bash_profile or open ~/.zshrc Adding the next line code () { VSCODE_CWD="$PWD" open -n -b "com.microsoft.VSCode" --args $* ;} Now, you can use in the terminal the shorcut code . code path/to/project/ Git commands open ~/.zshrc Adding the next line plugins=(git) Now, you can use in the terminal the shorcuts Alias Command g git ga git add gaa git add –all ggp git push origin $(current_branch) gcb git checkout -b gcm git checkout $(git_main_branch) For more shorcuts in the next link.
